summary.span: 命名空间包含可用于获取内置“服务器资源管理器”节点相关信息的类型，这些节点表示 SharePoint 站点上的各个组件，如表示列表、字段或内容类型的节点。

span.span: The namespace contains types you can use to get information about built-in **Server Explorer** nodes that represent individual components on a SharePoint site, such as nodes that represents lists, fields, or content types.

summary.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅[扩展服务器资源管理器中的 SharePoint 连接节点](/visualstudio/sharepoint/extending-the-sharepoint-connections-node-in-server-explorer)。

span.span: For more information, see [Extending the SharePoint Connections Node in Server Explorer](/visualstudio/sharepoint/extending-the-sharepoint-connections-node-in-server-explorer).
